The efreet are hateful and merciless genies from the Plane of Fire, where they build metropolises and massive trade centers that draw extraplanar travelers from across the multiverse. They are cruel slavers, vengeful warmongers, and sinister wish-masters; there are many tales of mortals who made pacts with efreet only to have their words twisted to suit a genie’s capricious and malevolent whims.
Efreet do not readily treat with other genies; they share an eternal feud with the djinn, disdain marids, regard jann as weaklings unworthy of the genie title, and only occasionally tolerate alliances with shaitans. At 12 feet tall and weighing 2,000 pounds, efreet are formidable opponents and cow their chosen victims with a glance. **[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 28 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23 [Efreeti](/Monsters.aspx?ID=214) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 164 **Perception** +17; darkvision, [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Ignan](/Languages.aspx?ID=18) **Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +14, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +22, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +14, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +19, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +17, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +19, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +14 **Str** +5 **Dex** +3 **Con** +4 **Int** +1 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +4 **Items** [Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=8)_ --- **AC** 28 **Fort** +18 **Ref** +17 **Will** +20 **HP** 175 **Immunities** fire **Weaknesses** cold 10 --- **Speed** 25 feet, fly 35 feet **Melee** _scimitar_ +21 ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [forceful +2](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)), **Damage** 2d6+11 slashing plus 2d6 fire **Melee** fist +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 1d4+11 bludgeoning plus 2d6 fire **Arcane Innate Spells** DC 29, attack +19 - **Cantrips (5th)** [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236) - **4th** [Gaseous Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=129), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (x2) - **5th** [Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=160) - **7th** [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (at will; to Astral Plane, Elemental Planes, or Material Plane only) - **Constant (5th)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) **Burning Grasp** ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) When the efreeti grabs a creature, that creature takes 2d6 fire damage, and takes 2d6 fire damage at the end of each of its turns as long as it remains grabbed. **Change Size** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** Once per day. **Effect** The efreeti changes a creature’s size. This works as a 4th-level [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) or [_shrink_](/Spells.aspx?ID=284) spell but can target an unwilling creature (DC 29 Fortitude save negates). **Combat Grab** **Requirements** The efreeti has one hand free. **Effect** The efreeti makes a melee Strike while keeping one hand free. If the Strike hits, the target is grabbed in the efreeti’s free hand.
Efreeti Maliks Efreeti maliks take pleasure in fulfilling wishes in pedantic ways that cause suffering, regret, or pain. A wisher for a thousand pounds of gemstones might have the gems delivered as a bone-crushing avalanche. Efreeti maliks add the following to their innate spells: **5th** [_fireball_ (at will)](/Spells.aspx?ID=119); **7th** [_volcanic eruption_](/Spells.aspx?ID=360).
